title: THRILLER: CLX Preview
body_text:
Giving Thanks!
Please support the Township of Ocean in helping with their annual
Thanksgiving Food Drive
! Canned vegetables, bags of pasta, boxes of rice – bring any nonperishable item(s) and give a little something back to those less fortunate. One can is all it takes!
Me, And All of You!
In a special attraction, competitors can choose to enter the full-court massacre known as the
Battle Royal
! Who will lay claim to the crown in this season finale first? Find out live October 18.
The MAIN EVENT: Kerr vs. Kerrin!
The Story
.. The year is 2006 and the world of
EastCoastDodgeball
was being blown away by fresh, new, top-notch talent with two of the years most prominent stars stepping out and into the forefront, shaking the very foundations of the sport all the way down to its roots.
But a sudden departure left ECD with a heavy void and the "dream" remained just that ...
... Now it's 2008, an agonizing 24 months later, and the so-called "dream" magically transforms into reality. Arguably the two most destructive female entities in the history of the game collide in this long-awaited "Dream Match" - and it happens just this once.
MELISSA KERR
She's the one and only "Giant Killer", looking to mercilessly stomp her untamed foe into oblivion. There isn't any doubt her glue-like hands, rocket fastballs, and overall wealth of experience will be tough obstacles to overcome. Having never served as an individual team general, it will be interesting to see what strategy she incorporates in forming the most formidable army possible.
Debut
:
DODGEBALL XL
on May 20, 2006
Major Run
: Regular competitor since
Notable Events
: DODGEBALL 92,
DODGEBALL CX
KERRIN MARCHESE
This no nonsense bad-a** returns to the dance after a lengthy hiatus and chances are, all that pent-up adrenaline and fierceness will be unleashed on her "giant" enemy. Her powerful right arm, lightning-fast feet, and unmirrored intensity will be keys to her success. Much like her headlining counterpart, army selections will be crucial if she plans on eliminating her CLX adversary.
Debut
:
DODGEBALL LX
on October 21, 2006
Major Run
: Fall / Winter 2006
Notable Events
:
DODGEBALL LXI
, DODGEBALL 68
How could anyone predict the outcome of this war!? What an unbelievably intense showdown this is slated to be. Catch this epic, never-before-witnessed clash of titans at DODGEBALL CLX!
"The Writer" Has It Covered!
Wildly colorful decorations and a high-octane soundtrack compiled by "The Writer" are just some of the bonuses in store! Hear the sounds and see the sights - a must attend!
We Want YOU Back!
Beloved relatives, close buddies, four-legged friends - we want you all back! Feel the electricity and power of this spectacular Season 16 Finale!
body_html:
Giving Thanks!
Please support the Township of Ocean in helping with their annual Thanksgiving Food Drive! Canned vegetables, bags of pasta, boxes of rice – bring any nonperishable item(s) and give a little something back to those less fortunate. One can is all it takes!

Me, And All of You!
In a special attraction, competitors can choose to enter the full-court massacre known as the Battle Royal! Who will lay claim to the crown in this season finale first? Find out live October 18.

The MAIN EVENT: Kerr vs. Kerrin!
The Story .. The year is 2006 and the world of EastCoastDodgeball was being blown away by fresh, new, top-notch talent with two of the years most prominent stars stepping out and into the forefront, shaking the very foundations of the sport all the way down to its roots.

But a sudden departure left ECD with a heavy void and the "dream" remained just that ...

... Now it's 2008, an agonizing 24 months later, and the so-called "dream" magically transforms into reality. Arguably the two most destructive female entities in the history of the game collide in this long-awaited "Dream Match" - and it happens just this once.

MELISSA KERR
She's the one and only "Giant Killer", looking to mercilessly stomp her untamed foe into oblivion. There isn't any doubt her glue-like hands, rocket fastballs, and overall wealth of experience will be tough obstacles to overcome. Having never served as an individual team general, it will be interesting to see what strategy she incorporates in forming the most formidable army possible.

Debut: DODGEBALL XL on May 20, 2006
Major Run: Regular competitor since
Notable Events: DODGEBALL 92, DODGEBALL CX

KERRIN MARCHESE
This no nonsense bad-a** returns to the dance after a lengthy hiatus and chances are, all that pent-up adrenaline and fierceness will be unleashed on her "giant" enemy. Her powerful right arm, lightning-fast feet, and unmirrored intensity will be keys to her success. Much like her headlining counterpart, army selections will be crucial if she plans on eliminating her CLX adversary.

Debut: DODGEBALL LX on October 21, 2006
Major Run: Fall / Winter 2006
Notable Events: DODGEBALL LXI, DODGEBALL 68

How could anyone predict the outcome of this war!? What an unbelievably intense showdown this is slated to be. Catch this epic, never-before-witnessed clash of titans at DODGEBALL CLX!

"The Writer" Has It Covered!
Wildly colorful decorations and a high-octane soundtrack compiled by "The Writer" are just some of the bonuses in store! Hear the sounds and see the sights - a must attend!

We Want YOU Back!
Beloved relatives, close buddies, four-legged friends - we want you all back! Feel the electricity and power of this spectacular Season 16 Finale!
